name: getProjectProperty
description:
Returns the value of a [project property](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/storing-data-without-a-database/#a-id-jira-entity-properties-a-jira-entity-properties).

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Browse Projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the project containing the property.

projectIdOrKey.description: The project ID or project key (case sensitive).

propertyKey.description: The project property key. Use [Get project property keys](#api-rest-api-3-project-projectIdOrKey-properties-get) to get a list of all project property keys.

$block: An entity property, for more information see [Entity properties](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/jira-entity-properties/).

$ul: **key**: The key of the property. Required on create and update.
**value**: The value of the property. Required on create and update.
